name: Treasure Checklist
description: Adds a checklist of your Treasure Room progress

misc-rewards.name: Misc. rewards
misc-rewards.description: Displays Color and Death effects in the checklist.

group-by-chest.name: Group by Chests
group-by-chest.description: Tier II rewards are grouped by chest instead of being displayed separately.

disable-checkmark.name: No Checkmark
disable-checkmark.description: Icons aren't greyed out and displayed without checkmark. If you want to see the designs.

remove-button.name: Not in Garage
remove-button.description: Removes the button from the Garage, so you can only see it in the Treasure Room.
